Supporting Research Pages¶

Phil can research answers for you. Hover over a clue and the answer is displayed in another window.

Research Pages Consulted¶

If “Research Clues” is checked, answers are looked up on Crossword Tracker.

If “Additional?” is also checked, Phil will additionally shows results from Merriam Webster, Google Translate and Google Define.

Note

Pages are shown after a brief delay of hovering over an answer.

Phil
